channel.title: 2 Annoying Problems
channel.description:
First one: I had a fix for this put in, but it doesn't seem to be working anymore :o My max level is 99, but when I use ::maxout, it stays at 1/1, doesn't even go up. I checked everything, and it SHOULD be working.
Second one: I spawned an item that made me log out. I can't log back into that account, and I tried going into the char file and deleting all my items, but that didn't work. Any ideas?
Sorry, I'm in a hurry...

item.title: 2 Annoying Problems
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Use this for max… if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("It's huge, omg!!!"); } and for the item part, what was the item you spawned? Private servers don’t have every item of rs in their cache so they crash if you spawn something that isn’t there.

Read full topic
